level.heading: Officers and employees -- other government employees; outside services [Repealed].
Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 110 of Anacostia Waterfront Corporation Emergency Act of 2004 (D.C. Act 15-586, November 1, 2004, 51 DCR 10681).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For D.C. Law 15-219, see notes following § 2-1223.01.
